AbortSignalReason.summary: The reason read-only property returns a JavaScript value that indicates the abort reason.

remarks.para:
The property is undefined when the signal has not been aborted.
It can be set to a specific value when the signal is aborted, using or .
If not explicitly set in those methods, it defaults to "AbortError" .

AbortSignalReason.value: A JavaScript value that indicates the abort reason, or undefined, if not aborted.
